answers.answer: Since  seroquel  can cause high BG you sure your diabetic and not as a result of seroquel raising your BG?Go to Google and put seroquel  into the serch field.

I wouldn't take serequel personally if I were diabetic.  it has a high risk of high blood glucose.  I haven't taken it since I have been diagnosed.  I think this is what has lead me to getting diabetes in the first place.

question: what happens if you continue to take seroquel after being diagnosed with diabetes?
title: seroquel problems and diabetes
